lyrics:
8 contributorstranslationsnederlandsopening the nightmare before christmas lyricsnarrator
twas a long time ago longer now than it seems
in a place that perhaps youve seen in your dreams
for the story that you are about to be told
began with the holiday worlds of old

now youve probably wondered where holidays come from
if you havent id say its time you begun
for the holidays are the result of much fuss
and hard work for the worlds that create them for us

well you see now quite simply thats all that they do
making one unique holiday especially for you
but once a calamity ever so great
occurred when two holidays met by mistakeyou might also likeembed
